short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily set up site redirects so you can see the sites you want to visit!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirectr will allow you to navigate the internet the way YOU want to navigate it. When you find yourself forgetting to go to preferred versions of your favorite sites (e.g. smile.amazon.com, old.reddit.com), just type them into Redirectr and forget about them. Adding Redirectr to chrome will enhance your experience by providing an easy solution to managing the websites that you visit.
